General.Name: Kindom Construction Corp
General.Description: Kindom Development Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in Taiwan. It operates through Development, Construction, and Shopping Mall segments. The company develops residential properties; leases and sells commercial buildings; operates department stores and supermarkets; wholesales medical equipment; and offers information software and management consultancy services. It also engages in the installation and engineering of electrical and fire safety equipment; investment and operation of shopping malls; and trading and non-store retailing business. Kindom Development Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 131, Heping East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
